summary: Birds are actually a type of dinosaur! There are over 11,000 bird species, and they are related to the dinosaurs that lived millions of years ago. Dinosaurs first appeared around 233-243 million years ago and became very successful. They were diverse, with some being huge and others small. Many were herbivores or carnivores and laid eggs. Birds evolved from a group of dinosaurs called theropods. While most dinosaurs went extinct around 66 million years ago, birds survived and are still here today.
title: Dinosaur
